Some gems have side effects, so pay attention to their colors. (Specifically, blue gems will give you a speed boost -- other gems are planned for future releases.) Some levels also have giant scary cats (also in hamster balls ðŸ™€) -- and if they notice you, they will come say "hi" to you, ...and probably kill you by accident. So... you might want to run from them!! Note: Roll or Die! was first developed as an entry to the the very first Metafest VR Game Jam, and it did so well that I'm going to be actively developing it, by fixing bugs and adding content. review_1: Its like super monkey ball 3d but in vr. Great game. Great mechanics. You collect gems and stars and each level has its own charm. Alot of love went into this game and it has an amazing sound track! Add this to your library today! You will not be disappointed.
